steps.content:
Ontologies in learning

digraph { 
 node [shape=plaintext];  "proto:Server" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">server</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:HttpMethod" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">HTTP method</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:ClientServerProtocol" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">client-server protocol</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:HttpMessage" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">HTTP message</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:CommunicationProtocol" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">communication protocol</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:Client" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">client</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:Post" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">POST</td></tr>
<tr><td border="0" align="right">isIdempotent</td><td border="0" align="left">false</td></tr><tr><td border="0" align="right">isSafe</td><td border="0" align="left">false</td></tr>
</table>
>] ;  "proto:Get" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">GET</td></tr>
<tr><td border="0" align="right">isIdempotent</td><td border="0" align="left">true</td></tr><tr><td border="0" align="right">isSafe</td><td border="0" align="left">true</td></tr>
</table>
>] ;  "proto:Http" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">HTTP</td></tr>
<tr><td border="0" align="right">fullName</td><td border="0" align="left">Hypertext Transfer Protocol</td></tr>
</table>
>] ;  "proto:HttpResponse" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">HTTP response</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:Message" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">message</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:MessagePart" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">message part</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:HttpRequest" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">HTTP request</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "proto:HttpMethod" -> "proto:HttpRequest" [label="partof"] ;  "proto:HttpMethod" -> "proto:MessagePart" [label="is a"] ;  "proto:ClientServerProtocol" -> "proto:CommunicationProtocol" [label="is subclass of"] ;  "proto:HttpMessage" -> "proto:Message" [label="is subclass of"] ;  "proto:Post" -> "proto:HttpMethod" [label="is a"] ;  "proto:Get" -> "proto:HttpMethod" [label="is a"] ;  "proto:Http" -> "proto:ClientServerProtocol" [label="is a"] ;  "proto:HttpResponse" -> "proto:Client" [label="receiver"] ;  "proto:HttpResponse" -> "proto:Server" [label="sender"] ;  "proto:HttpResponse" -> "proto:HttpMessage" [label="is subclass of"] ;  "proto:HttpRequest" -> "proto:Client" [label="sender"] ;  "proto:HttpRequest" -> "proto:Server" [label="receiver"] ;  "proto:HttpRequest" -> "proto:HttpMessage" [label="is subclass of"] ;}

digraph { 
 node [shape=plaintext];  "learn:LearningStrategy" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">learning strategy</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "learn:SpacedPractice" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">spaced practice</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "learn:Interleaving" [label=<<table>
<tr><td border="0" colspan="2">interleaving</td></tr>

</table>
>] ;  "learn:SpacedPractice" -> "learn:LearningStrategy" [label="is a"] ;  "learn:Interleaving" -> "learn:LearningStrategy" [label="is a"] ;}
